intro: The v-radio component is a simple radio button. When combined with the v-radio-group component you can provide groupable functionality to allow users to select from a predefined set of options.

colors.heading: Colors
colors.intro: Radios can be colored by using any of the builtin colors and contextual names using the color prop.

direction.heading: Direction
direction.intro: Radio-groups can be presented either as a row or a column, using their respective props. The default is as a column.

mandatory.heading: Mandatory
mandatory.intro: Radio-groups are by default not mandatory. This can be changed with the mandatory prop.

label.heading: Label
label.intro: Radio Group labels can be defined in label slot - that will allow to use HTML content.
